title: Sync Measurement Events Request
description: Request parameters for configuring measurement IDs on an account with upsert semantics

account_id.description: Account to configure measurement IDs for

measurements.description: Measurement IDs to sync (create or update)

measurement_id.description: Unique identifier for this measurement ID

name.description: Human-readable name for this measurement ID

allowed_domains.description: Domains authorized to send events for this measurement ID

delete_missing.description: When true, measurement IDs not included in this sync will be removed
